25 #ifndef __BITPIT_PIERCED_SYNC_HPP__
26 #define __BITPIT_PIERCED_SYNC_HPP__
27 
28 #include <array>
29 #include <memory>
30 #include <unordered_map>
31 #include <vector>
32 
33 namespace bitpit {
34 
40 class PiercedSyncAction {
41 
42 public:
46  enum ActionType {
47  TYPE_UNDEFINED = -1,
48  TYPE_NOOP,
49  TYPE_CLEAR,
50  TYPE_RESERVE,
51  TYPE_RESIZE,
52  TYPE_SHRINK_TO_FIT,
53  TYPE_REORDER,
54  TYPE_APPEND,
55  TYPE_INSERT,
56  TYPE_OVERWRITE,
57  TYPE_MOVE_APPEND,
58  TYPE_MOVE_INSERT,
59  TYPE_MOVE_OVERWRITE,
60  TYPE_SWAP,
61  TYPE_PIERCE
62  };
63 
67  enum ActionInfo {
68  INFO_POS = 0,
69  INFO_POS_FIRST = 0,
70  INFO_POS_SECOND = 1,
71  INFO_POS_NEXT = 1,
72  INFO_SIZE = 1,
73  INFO_COUNT = 2
74  };
75 
76  PiercedSyncAction(ActionType _type = TYPE_UNDEFINED);
77  PiercedSyncAction(const PiercedSyncAction &other);
78 
79  PiercedSyncAction & operator=(const PiercedSyncAction &other);
80  PiercedSyncAction & operator=(PiercedSyncAction&&) = default;
81 
82  void swap(PiercedSyncAction &other) noexcept;
83 
84  void importData(const std::vector<std::size_t> &values);
85 
86  // Dump and restore
87  void restore(std::istream &stream);
88  void dump(std::ostream &stream) const;
89 
90  // Data
91  ActionType type;
92  std::array<std::size_t, INFO_COUNT> info;
93  std::unique_ptr<std::vector<std::size_t>> data;
94 
95 };
96 
103 class PiercedSyncSlave {
104 
105 friend class PiercedSyncMaster;
106 
107 protected:
108  PiercedSyncSlave();
109 
110  void swap(PiercedSyncSlave &x) noexcept;
111 
112  virtual void commitSyncAction(const PiercedSyncAction &action) = 0;
113 
114 };
115 
122 class PiercedSyncMaster {
123 
124 public:
128  typedef std::vector<PiercedSyncSlave *> SyncGroup;
129 
133  enum SyncMode {
134  SYNC_MODE_CONCURRENT,
135  SYNC_MODE_JOURNALED,
136  SYNC_MODE_DISABLED,
137  SYNC_MODE_ITR_COUNT = SYNC_MODE_DISABLED + 1,
138  SYNC_MODE_ITR_BEGIN = 0,
139  SYNC_MODE_ITR_END = SYNC_MODE_ITR_BEGIN + SYNC_MODE_ITR_COUNT
140  };
141 
142 protected:
146  struct SyncModeHasher
147  {
148  template <typename T>
149  std::size_t operator()(T t) const
150  {
151  return static_cast<std::size_t>(t);
152  }
153  };
154 
158  std::unordered_map<PiercedSyncSlave *, SyncMode> m_slaves;
159 
163  std::unordered_map<SyncMode, SyncGroup, SyncModeHasher> m_syncGroups;
164 
168  std::vector<PiercedSyncAction> m_syncJournal;
169 
170  PiercedSyncMaster();
171 
172  void registerSlave(PiercedSyncSlave *slave, PiercedSyncMaster::SyncMode syncMode);
173  void unregisterSlave(const PiercedSyncSlave *slave);
174  bool isSlaveRegistered(const PiercedSyncSlave *slave) const;
175  PiercedSyncMaster::SyncMode getSlaveSyncMode(const PiercedSyncSlave *slave) const;
176  bool isSlaveSynced(const PiercedSyncSlave *slave) const;
177 
178  void setSyncEnabled(bool enabled);
179  bool isSyncEnabled() const;
180 
181  void sync();
182  bool isSynced() const;
183 
184  void swap(PiercedSyncMaster &x) noexcept;
185 
186  void processSyncAction(const PiercedSyncAction &action);
187 
188  // Dump and restore
189  void restore(std::istream &stream);
190  void dump(std::ostream &stream) const;
191 
192 private:
193  bool m_syncEnabled;
194 
195  void commitSyncAction(PiercedSyncSlave *slave, const PiercedSyncAction &action);
196  void journalSyncAction(const PiercedSyncAction &action);
197 
198 };
199 
200 }
201 
202 #endif
